summary: Replacer for stormcloak curaiss. Also replaces city guards see description. bethesda made this i am just making it simple for people who want to use it.
descriptionHtml:
Goes perfect with the mod Perfect Legionare to provide armors with at least sleeve protection against harsh elements for the civil war factions. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6085

UPDATE!
MokChaoticran HAS MADE A FIX FOR THE KILT STRIPE PROBLEM AND ALLOWED ME TO MAKE THE DOWNLOAD AVAILABLE HERE- WORKS LIKE A CHARM.- THANKS


In the creation kit i noticed there was an armour that was stormcloak with sleeves. i thought thats odd they had it made but just prefered the guards to be in short sleeves in the freezing cold? well everyone is entitled to their own opinions and this is for people who want the stormcloaks and the guards to have sleeves on their shirts. 

issues-
    replaces the mesh for guards as well and as a consequence a piece of the cloth that hangs lower in this version is cut off on guards see picture. it looks like it was dipped in paint. i dont really mind it myself.

install- extract and put it where it goes or use nmm
author: frank zunge
